/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a tranquil scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a serene ambiance over the scene. In the distance, power lines stretch across the sky, a subtle reminder of urban life. The image is captured in a panoramic format, providing a wide view of the street and its surroundings. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. This image truly captures the essence of a peaceful day in Beijing.
